text: Has anyone ever generated a dynamic/personalized ical link that is sent out via email? Something like an appointment confirmation email that then has all the details in the ical link?
hi everyone, is there a variable I can use for “last page seen” property to generate that link in custom coded emails?
Does anyone have recommendations for embedding images into marketing emails so they won't get blocked by Outlook desktop version?
What do you mean by blocked?
It may be possible to do with the programmable email beta, but I don't know for sure (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails>).
Have you taken a look at <https://blog.HubSpot.com/marketing/calendar-invites-ical-outlook-google>?

If you're referring to images being turned off, this is a user setting and can't be controlled or worked around. It's not just Outlook, Gmail and others also allow the user to show or not show images in their settings.
